text: Kyle Martino (born February 19, 1981 in Atlanta, Georgia) is a former American soccer player who played for the Columbus Crew and the Los Angeles Galaxy. ==Career statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup Playoffs Playoffs North America North America Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals 2002 Columbus Crew Major League Soccer 22 2 4 1 4 0 – – 30 3 2003 Columbus Crew Major League Soccer 22 2 0 0 – – – – 22 2 2004 Columbus Crew Major League Soccer 29 5 2 0 2 0 – – 33 5 2005 Columbus Crew Major League Soccer 27 5 1 1 – – – – 28 6 2006 Columbus Crew Major League Soccer 6 1 0 0 – – – – 6 1 2006 Los Angeles Galaxy Major League Soccer 9 0 0 0 – – – – 9 0 2007 Los Angeles Galaxy Major League Soccer 26 3 – – – – 3 0 29 3 Career total Career total Career total 141 13 7 2 6 0 3 0 157 15 ==Honors== Columbus Crew *Lamar Hunt U.S. Open Cup: 2002 *MLS Supporters' Shield: 2004 Individual *MLS Rookie of the Year: 2002 ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Atlanta Category:American soccer players
